content: This is the Zulip Stream for the CMS Connecathon ONC FAST Directory track -- please post questions/comments here related to the existing IGs, the reference implementations and the planned new IG effort

@Robert Dieterle is there an endpoint, CAQH or other, that we can hit to start identifying Payer endpoints for the Patient Access API? I know they're supposed to be readily and publicly available on the respective websites but are sometimes difficult to find.

Yes, you can use the CAQH Payer endpoint directory to obtain endpoints for payers that are participating in that directory effort. Some of the payers are choosing to make the endpoint information available on their website.

Robert Dieterle said:

Yes, you can use the CAQH Payer endpoint directory to obtain endpoints for payers that are participating in that directory effort. Some of the payers are choosing to make the endpoint information available on their website.

I do not believe @Robert Dieterle CAQH has made their payer directory endpoints publicly available. This informational splash page has been all I could find for the last year. https://www.caqh.org/solutions/early-participants Is there a publicly available site somewhere that I'm missing that includes the payer endpoint information? CARIN has put up a free, publicly accessible directory that's crowd-sourced but it only has a handful of payers in it. https://carinfhirdirectory.com/
